document_data.name: Physician's Order
document_data.services:
Medical and embalming services
Medicinal items for sale
document_data.mainbody: The '''Physician's Order''' was a guildhall in [[Daggerford]] that served as a meeting place for the town's apothecaries, healers, and morticians.
document_data.Location: The hall was located in the center of town within the [[Caravan Quarter]], quite close to the [[Clean Chin]] barber shop/mortuary{{Cite interactive atlas|3990 Daggerford}}
document_data.Services: Visitors to the Physician's Order were granted access to a number of goods and services. They could purchase medicinal [[herb]]s and substances, employ the work of healers and surgeons, and even seek out [[magic]]al cures to their ailments.
